blocks.name: itgeq12dv
blocks.content: Equality theorem for an integral. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgeq12dv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, c3), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))))), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))))), w0)
  sumeq2sdv(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))), w0)
  oveq2d(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), w0)
  fveq2d(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), w0)
  mpteq2dv(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))), cif(cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))), w0)
  ifbieq12d2(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))
  bitrd(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c0, c2, w0)
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))
  fvoveq1d(cre, c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqidd(nat0, wa(w0, wn(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))
  dfitg(s0, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  dfitg(s0, hs0, c2, c3, cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cfv(cre, co(c3, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfz, nat3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
